abstract: The actor, famous for his roles on previous sitcoms as well as his public battle with Parkinson’s disease, will return to television in the fall of 2013.
snippet: The actor, famous for his roles on previous sitcoms as well as his public battle with Parkinson’s disease, will return to television in the fall of 2013.
lead_paragraph: 7:26 p.m. | Updated The NBC network has won the bidding war for a new sitcom starring Michael J. Fox, the actor famous for his roles on “Family Ties” and “Spin City” and for his public battle with Parkinson’s disease.

headline.main: NBC Will Broadcast New Michael J. Fox Show
